- We’ve made a new registration and authentication flow available for users on iPads
- Use your password manager to auto-fill passwords during login
- You can now use the sliding drawer menu in landscape on iPhone

Minor bug fixes and various performance improvements.
Minor bug fixes and various performance improvements.
Minor bug fixes and various performance improvements

New features. Improved reliability. Squashed bugs.
We never stop working to make your TextNow experience better.

TextNow is refreshing its look! In this release we're packing in a new app icon, new logo, and a new default theme color for you to enjoy, with the same great service under the hood.

We never stop working to make your TextNow experience better.

Crash fixes.

We never stop working to make your TextNow experience better.
We never stop working to make your TextNow experience better.

- Added large font support for Conversations.
- Replaced generic error messages on login with more meaningful and simple error messages.
- Improvements to the dialer page on outgoing calls.
- Improved our handling of notifications for more reliable alerts.
- Various performance improvements.

We never stop working to make your TextNow experience better.

- Introducing Smart Actions, context-sensitive shortcut buttons that allow you to use the app more efficiently.
- New buttons for SIM card activations with clearer messages.
- Fixed a minor bug with drafts not showing saved pictures or videos in a conversation.
- Various performance improvements.
- Fixed a bug in the sign-up process

Animated GIFs are now supported in TextNow!
Various performance improvements.
Bug fixes and various performance improvements.

- Improved the size, shape and quality of media you can share with your contacts.
- Fixed a bug where blocking one number could inadvertently block others.
- Updated support options.
- Various other bug fixes and stability improvements.

- Fixed a bug on conversations that caused a significant lag when trying to open the camera.
- Fixed a bug where the app would fail to ask you for permission to access your microphone on calls if no previous permission was given.
- Fixed a bug where blocking a specific contact would accidentally block other unrelated contacts.
- Various performance improvements.

- Fixed a bug that would still send verifications to your old email address if you've updated it in the app.
- Fixed a bug that hid the default notification sound in the list of available sounds.
- Fixed a bug preventing incoming notifications from being sent to Apple Watch.
- Various performance improvements.

- Fixed a bug that caused text to blink while recording video from fullscreen in TextNow.
- Fixed a bug that caused the Conversation page to break when receiving a message or phone call.
- Fixed a bug that could continue to show ads after purchasing Premium until you force-closed the app and logged back in.
- Fixed a bug that would take you to the Conversation page briefly before the dialer pad when making or receiving a call.
- Fixed a bug in Call History that would show the last disconnected call as being "In-Call".
Various performance improvements and minor bug fixes.

- Added support for sharing photos, texts and links via TextNow.
- Fixed a bug where incoming call notifications would appear even though notifications were disabled in the the phone's settings.
- Various performance improvements.

Improvements in call quality and calling experience.
Miscellaneous bug fixes.
Fixes an issue that was causing the app to crash for some users during on-boarding.
Miscellaneous bug fixes.
Various performance improvements and minor bug fixes.

- Fixed a bug that incorrectly showed notifications about conversations that have already been read in the device Notification Center.
- Various performance improvements.
Various performance improvements.
Various performance improvements.
Minor bug fixes and various performance improvements
Minor bug fixes and various performance improvements.
Minor bug fixes and various performance improvements.
Fixed the crash where users were unable to login, send a text or make a call.
Minor bug fixes and various performance improvements.

- Drawer menu was re-designed and now uses buttons to link to functions such as “My Account”, “Add Data”, “Premium Subscription”, and “Earning Credits”
- Added various phone number registration improvements
- Miscellaneous bug fixes
* Moved banner ad to help prevent accidental clicks

- We’ve made a new registration and authentication flow available for users on iPads
- Use your password manager to auto-fill passwords during login
- You can now use the sliding drawer menu in landscape on iPhone
- More bug fixes and performance improvements
Bug fixes and performance improvements

- Improved the user experience for the drawer
- Bug fixes and performance improvements

- Modernized the look and feel of the app experience. Stay tuned, more updates to come!
- Other bug fixes and performance improvements
- Bug fixes related to iPad and landscape mode

Bug fix

• Fixes issue where premium users saw post conversation ad
• Fixes issue where revoking a number was causing a crash
• Other bug fixes and performance improvements
- Bug fixes and performance improvements
- Bug fixes
- Bug fixes
* Bug fixes.

*NEW FEATURE* Now you can use TextNow without WiFi! Get unlimited calling and texting over the Nationwide Sprint Network -- for FREE. Check if your phone is eligible, and get phone service without the phone bill by clicking on "Free Coverage" in the app menu.

* Crash and bug fixes

*NEW FEATURE* Now you can use TextNow without WiFi! Get unlimited calling and texting in the US over the Nationwide Sprint Network -- for FREE. Check if your phone is eligible, and get phone service without the phone bill by clicking on "Free Coverage" in the app menu.

- Fixed a crash that occasionally happened when making a new call.
- Fixed an issue impacting the ability to register.

-Dropping support for iOS 10
-iOS 13 optimizations
-Bug fixes and improvements

- Bug fixes and performance improvements

Note: We recently addressed a temporary server outage that led to some users experiencing dropped messages and emoji formatting. All functionality should now be restored.
- Bug fixes and performance improvements
Bug fixes and performance improvements

- Added the ability to report messages as junk to prevent receiving spam messages in the future.
- Fixed issue on iPad where the conversation list wouldn't show properly.
- Fixed issue with conversation display after pressing a push notification.

- Fixed Blank conversation shown when navigating back to it iPad
- Portrait Mode is Now Forced When Using Free Cellular Flow
- Fixed a couple of high impacting crashes

- Support for Apple Sign In
- Bug fixes and feature enhancements.

New & Noticeable:
• Previously you may have noticed some issues with your Contacts showing up incorrectly - A’s under B’s, it was madness. Your contacts should now index and show up correctly. Order has been restored.

New & Not So Noticeable:
• There is no longer a sketch feature (but we suspect it won’t be missed).
• Clicking on the top navigation bar of anything other than a conversation thread will no longer bring up a contact/conversation detail screen.
• There is now a white border around the unread message badge in your conversations.
• The usual bug fixes and performance improvements.

New & Noticeable:
- Your messages will now appear in the correct order on all of your devices. Yay.
- You will no longer see a blank screen when trying to add an attachment to a message.
- For you iPad users - you will now be able to see the entire dial pad without the top being cut off. You’re welcome.

New & Not So Noticeable:
- The border of message notification badges on the home screen are a teeeny bit thicker.
- The first numbers of your credit card on the SIM card purchase summary page are now hidden by stars.
- Error screens for the Nationwide Talk & Text flow are better looking.

New & Noticeable:
- Your messages will now appear in the correct order on all of your devices. Yay.
- You will no longer see a blank screen when trying to add an attachment to a message.
- For you iPad users - you will now be able to see the entire dial pad without the top being cut off. You're welcome.

New & Not So Noticeable:
- The border of message notification badges on the home screen are a teeeny bit thicker.
- The first numbers of your credit card on the SIM card purchase summary page are now hidden by stars.
- Error screens for the Nationwide Talk & Text flow are better looking.

New & Noticeable:
* Attaching a photo to a message will no longer crash the app. Go ahead and send those pics.
* We’ve changed the way we ask for permissions - we’ll now only ask for the contacts permission when it’s needed.
* You won’t experience any more issues getting stuck on the Add New Contact screen when trying to add an unknown number.

New & Not So Noticeable:
* In some rare cases, people were getting stuck on the login/sign up screen after entering their username and password. This has been fixed and you can now sign up/log in without issue.
* The usual bug fixes and performance improvements.

New & Noticeable:
• Ad Free+/Premium subscribers: When entering a call forwarding phone number (in the Call Forwarding section of the settings), the default keyboard that now pops up is a numerical one, rather than the standard keyboard.

New & Not So Noticeable:
• You can now click on ads on the conversation screen.
• There is no longer a “report junk/spam” button when you are the one crafting a new message
• A bug was causing the bottom part of the screen to go black between the conversation and home screen but we’ve fixed this.
• The usual bug fixes and performance improvements.

New & Noticeable:
• If your contact doesn't have a saved image, you'll now see their initials placed in a little colorful circle as their default image on the home, conversation and contact screen.
• When you enter a name into the "To" field of a new message, we will no longer add "@textnow.me" to the name.
• TextNow contacts that have been blocked are now displayed by their phone numbers instead of their usernames.

New & Not So Noticeable:
• If you're buying a SIM card and your credit card is rejected for being invalid, you will see a new alert on the summary screen letting you know.
• The usual bug fixes and performance improvements.

New & Noticeable:
• If your contact doesn't have a saved image, you'll now see their initials placed in a little colorful circle as their default image on the home, conversation and contact screen.
• When you enter a name into the "To" field of a new message, we will no longer add "@textnow.me" to the name.
• TextNow contacts that have been blocked are now displayed by their phone numbers instead of their usernames.

New & Not So Noticeable:
• If you're buying a SIM card and your credit card is rejected for being invalid, you will see a new alert on the summary screen letting you know.
• The usual bug fixes and performance improvements.

New & Noticeable:
• There were some issues with being unable to delete things from the conversation screen. This is no longer an issue and you can delete whatever you want.

New & Not So Noticeable:
• The usual bug fixes and performance improvements.

New & Noticeable:
• You can now delete messages in your inbox from us, TextNow (but we hope you don't)
• The "Keep Editing" button now works as it should when you're creating a new contact

New & Not So Noticeable:
• When creating a group conversation, it no longer says "Broadcast"
• The usual bug fixes and performance improvements.

New & Noticeable:
• Incoming calls were not showing up on the call screen if you were already on a call; we've fixed this so you can see all of your incoming calls as you should.
New & Not So Noticeable:
• The usual bug fixes and performance improvements.

New & Noticeable:
* The app no longer crashes when attempting to send an image.
* There were some cases of not being able to block or unblock certain people. You can now block or unblock whomever you want without any issues.
* The avatar button on the conversation screen was supposed to be tappable, but it wasn't, but it is now.
* The sign in button now remains disabled until the email and password field are both filled.
* The rewarded video feature has been temporarily disabled.

New & Not So Noticeable:
* The usual bug fixes and performance improvements.

New & Noticeable:
* The app no longer crashes when attempting to send an image.
* There were some cases of not being able to block or unblock certain people. You can now block or unblock whomever you want without any issues.
* The avatar button on the conversation screen was supposed to be tappable, but it wasn't, but it is now.
* The sign in button now remains disabled until the email and password field are both filled.
* The rewarded video feature has been temporarily disabled.

New & Not So Noticeable:
* The usual bug fixes and performance improvements.

New & Noticeable:
• Nothing new this time but we update weekly, so check back next week.

New & Not So Noticeable:
• The usual bug fixes and performance improvements.

New & Noticeable:
• Nothing new this time but we update weekly, so check back next week.

New & Not So Noticeable:
• The usual bug fixes and performance improvements.

New & Noticeable:
• The call and message buttons on the conversation list screen are now animated for new users to make it clearer what each button does.

New & Not So Noticeable:
• The ad push banner should no longer show when it's not supposed to.
• Ads shown after calls can now also display Amazon-offered ads.
• We now have more analytic insights into app crashes.

New & Noticeable:
• There’s a new and improved login flow
• There’s now a “share number” feature available for all users
• Some issues with blocking short code numbers have been fixed

New & Not So Noticeable:
• Some minor design changes to the Contacts screen.
• The usual bug fixes and performance improvements.

New & Noticeable:
- You’ll now see a success message after you watch a rewarded video.
- Images sent in a text message will now show up in the push notification to the recipient.
- Fixed an issue affecting sharing TextNow on Facebook.

New & Not So Noticeable:
- The usual bug fixes and performance improvements.

New & Noticeable:
•Nothing new this time but we update weekly, so check back next week.

New & Not So Noticeable:
•The usual bug fixes and performance improvements.

New & Noticeable:
• Nothing new this time but we update weekly, so check back next week.

New & Not So Noticeable:
• The usual bug fixes and performance improvements.

New & Noticeable:
• Fixed a bug where the video scrubber wasn't staying on track.
• Fixed an iPad-related bug where the drawer would get stuck in the wrong layout on sign out/in.
• Fixed buggy filtering of conversations on iOS 11/12.

New & Not So Noticeable:
• Minor bug fixes and performance improvements.

New & Noticeable:
• Fixed visual bugs on the conversation screen.

New & Not So Noticeable:
• Minor performance improvements.

New & Noticeable:
- New users will see an improved introductory experience.
- Fixed broken cancel button on iPad Contacts view.
- Added a button on voicemails that forwards to setup a custom voicemail.

New & Not So Noticeable:
- The usual bug fixes and performance improvements.

New & Noticeable:
- Bug fix: latest text message received is no longer hidden under on-screen keyboard.

New & Not So Noticeable:
- The usual minor bug fixes and performance improvements.

New & Noticeable:
- No new features this time but we update weekly, so check back next week.

New & Not So Noticeable:
- Users can no longer earn credits by sharing their TextNow number.
- New users will be asked for location permissions when choosing their TextNow number.
- Improved error messaging on sign-up to be clearer.
- New users can now sign up quicker from the select a number screen.
- Fixed bug on iOS 13 where a conversation's nav bar would disappear if the user cancelled creating a new contact during the conversation at a specific point.

New & Noticeable
• No new features this time but we update weekly, so check back next week.

New & Not So Noticeable:
• Fixed bug where green call-in-progress banner was not showing up on iPad in landscape mode.
• Fixed bug where boxes were being displayed too closely together on interstitial ads.
• Fixed bug where in-call screen wasn't being dismissed immediately when the rate-call dialog was shown.
• Fixed bug where Terms of Use & Privacy Policy text boxes were getting cut off.

New & Noticeable:
• You can now add GIFs to your messages with the new built-in GIF search engine, available right in the message reply field.
• Twitter icon now appears when sharing TextNow
• Conversations now resize properly when writing a message containing pictures or GIFs when a user was blocked.

New & Not So Noticeable:
• The usual minor bug squishing and performance improvements.

New & Noticeable:
• You can now add GIFs to your messages with the new built-in GIF search engine, available right in the message reply field.
• Twitter icon now appears when sharing TextNow
• Conversations now resize properly when writing a message containing pictures or GIFs when a user was blocked.

New & Not So Noticeable:
• The usual minor bug squishing and performance improvements.

New & Noticeable:
- Improved and expanded errors messages when trying to sign-in using the incorrect authentication method.
- Updated layout for iPads for the landscape view on the login/sign-up screens.
- Added additional navigation buttons to the login and sign-up screens.

New and Not-so Noticeable:
- The usual minor bug fixes and performance improvements.

New & Noticeable:
- Clarified error messages during the number selection part of sign-up.
- Fixed UI issues on the number selection seen by some iPad users.

New and Not-so Noticeable:
- The usual minor bug fixes and performance improvements.

New and Not-so Noticeable:
• The usual minor bug fixes and performance improvements.

New & Noticeable:
• No longer crashes when tapping on the cancel button from country screen after removing text from the search bar.

New and Not-so Noticeable:
• The usual minor bug fixes and performance improvements.

New & Noticeable:
• Fixed bug where tapping on the GIF search bar after scrolling through available GIFs wouldn't bring up the keyboard unless you tapped on Search again.
• No longer shows last email used on signup screen
• Fixed bug where an incoming call would continue to ring if cancelled from a notification pop-up.

New and Not-so Noticeable:
• Additional minor bug fixes, plus performance and stability improvements.

New & Noticeable:
- Fixed a bug when opening a message from a notification would open the conversation with the giphy keyboard open instead of the regular keyboard.
- Fixed a bug that prevented users from swiping to dismiss the new Profile settings screen.
- Fixed a crash an intermittent crash the home screen.

New and Not-so Noticeable:
- Additional minor bug fixes, plus performance and stability improvements.

New & Noticeable:
- Giphy messaging plug-in has been updated for increased stability and performance.
- Added an "interests" field to the profile.
- Crushed ad-related bugs.

New and Not-so Noticeable:
- Much under-the-hood work done to clean up and improve overall performance & stability.
- Minor bugs also crushed.

New & Noticeable:
• Sharing images bug has been fixed.
• Search bar crash has been fixed.

New & Not So Noticeable:
• Performance improvements and minor bug squishing.

New & Noticeable:
• Destroyed a bug where the area code choice screen wouldn't display correctly on iPhone SE.
• Smooshed a bug where sponsored conversations from TextNow would open the wrong link when clicked.

New & Not So Noticeable:
• Additional minor bug fixes, plus performance and stability improvements.

New & Noticeable:
• Demolished a bug that prevented users from cancelling when adding info to an existing contact from the dial pad.

New and Not-so Noticeable:
• Minor bug fixes, plus performance and stability improvements.

- Squished a bug that prevented the user from updating their email address.

• Crushed an iOS 12 bug where the app would crash when opening from an external link.

New and Not-so Noticeable:
• Loads of our usual optimization and minor bug fixes, plus performance and stability improvements.

New & Noticeable:
• Dialer now functions properly when the phone's display setting is set to Zoomed.

New and Not-so Noticeable:
• Plus, our usual optimization and minor bug fixes, performance, and stability improvements.

New & Noticeable:
• Crushed a bug on the login password field.
• Smooshed a bug that accidentally disabled the login button.

New and Not-so Noticeable:
• Plus, our usual optimization and minor bug fixes, performance, and stability improvements.

New & Noticeable:
• We are very pleased to announce *** Video calling *** is now available, for free, to all iOS users! You'll find the video calling icon at the top right of your TextNow conversation. Try it out!
• Also crushed a bug that accidentally disabled the logout button. Not quite as exciting as video calling, granted , but still notable.

New and Not-so Noticeable:
• Plus, our usual optimization and minor bug fixes, performance, and stability improvements.

New & Noticeable:
• Improved messaging for login/signup errors.
• Crushed a bug that made the dialer screen unresponsive for some users.

New and Not-so Noticeable:
• Plus, our usual optimization and minor bug fixes, performance, and stability improvements.

New & Noticeable:
• No new features this week, but a quick reminder to try out our video calling feature that we added last week. We think it's pretty cool.
• Added an alert for Nationwide Talk & Text users reminding users to connect to Wi-fi to make a videocall.

New and Not-so Noticeable:
• Loads of under-the-hood work with regards to video calling. Did we mention we have video calling?
Plus, our usual optimization and minor bug fixes, performance, and stability improvements.

New & Noticeable:
• No new features this week, but a quick reminder to try out our video calling feature that we added last week. We think it's pretty cool.
• Added an alert for Nationwide Talk & Text users reminding users to connect to Wi-fi to make a videocall.
• Fixed a bug where a small number of users were unable to video call within the app.

New and Not-so Noticeable:
• Loads of under-the-hood work with regards to video calling. Did we mention we have video calling?
Plus, our usual optimization and minor bug fixes, performance, and stability improvements.
